Method Detail

synchronize

public void synchronize()
Adds this node's current, baseLevel, and residual activation to total activation. Also updates activation buffers. This method should only be invoked when activation passing for this cycle is complete.

Specified by:
synchronize in interface PamNode
Overrides:
synchronize in class NodeImpl

hasBeenSynchronized

public boolean hasBeenSynchronized()
Determines if this node has been synchronized. This is done by comparing the total activation of this node, to the activation lowe bound.

Returns:
true if this node has been synchronized.
See Also:
Parameters#ACTIVATION_LOWERBOUND

isRelevant

public boolean isRelevant()
Determines if this node is relevant. A node is relevant if its total activation is greater or equal to the selection threshold.

Specified by:
isRelevant in interface PamNode
Overrides:
isRelevant in class NodeImpl
Returns:
true if this node is relevant
See Also:
selectionThreshold
